frontmatter.title: CHIC
frontmatter.description: China Hardware Innovation Center, 1 year and a half long project in a team of 5 students from 3 different schools, to design and create a connected object.

node.excerpt: China Hardware Innovation Center, or CHIC, was a year and a half long project in a team of 5 skilled studets, where we designed from scracth…
node.html: China Hardware Innovation Center, or CHIC, was a year and a half long project in a team of 5 skilled studets, where we designed from scracth a connected smart sensor for home plants, that can transform any plant into a highly sensitive touch sensor.

frontmatter.title: Robottle
frontmatter.description: Robottle is an autonomous robot able to collect plastic bottles in a random environment. It was entirely done in a team of 3 students.

node.excerpt: Robottle was made for an academic event hosted at EPFL, where autonomous robots have to collect plastic bottles in a random environement and…
node.html:
Robottle was made for an academic event hosted at EPFL, where autonomous robots have to collect plastic bottles in a random environement and bring them back to a recycling area.

Our robot featured states of the art technologies, including a Lidar to run SLAM algorithm, a camera with Deep Neural Network for object recognition. You can see more about our robot with this video that we made to illustrate our project.

frontmatter.title: Vici
frontmatter.description: During a 3 days hackhathon, we developed a mobile app to help local stores gain visibility.
